name: The Good Saw
description:
Everybody knows the Saw. Some  of people say that he is a judge, he ensure the judgement. Some of people think that he is a psychopath his ways is not humanistic. He did not want to be called a "psychopath". The Saw decided to change himself and he  become The Good Saw.
